Yesterday the outside world had been green, but for some wicked reason someone lay down a giant white carpet on our neighborhood. Tiny snowflakes fell down from the sky. Over the hedge I saw Deidre (our neighbor) shoving snow from her lawn. She wasn't really enjoying it.

She had difficulties lifting the snow with her shovel. Besides that she was struggling with her own clothes. Probably thought she would catch a cold if she didn't dress up like an Eskimo. On the other side of the street two teenagers were messing around in the snow. 16 year old Emily hit her brother right on the face. Dave, slightly younger than his sister, laughed, took off his glasses to rub the sticky snow off and quickly began to return fire. The twins were different in many ways. Emily was tall, outgoing and no smarter than a ten year old, while her brother was on the short side and more introvert he could solve any formula given to him. Seeing Dave outside with his sister surprised me, most of the time he rather played videogames than do anything out in public. Maybe it was part of his new year resolution.

Another teen, probably around the twin's age, was selling something from door to door. "Stupid scout"

"How will I ever survive this winter holiday," I stood up. It was still early in the morning. I was the only one awake in the house (at least I thought I was). Mom and Matt were still snoring upstairs. I didn't put on any clothes yet. I was only dressed in nighties and a bathrobe. "Maybe, I should get some clothes on," I walked towards the Christmas tree. I stopped and stared at it for a minute. Mom made such a ritual of dressing up the Christmas tree. She didn't care much about Christmas habits, but the tree had to be perfect.

She even put little candy canes on the branches. "Crazy mom," I smiled and looked downwards the tree. Something suddenly caught my eye. "Huh? What's this?," I picked up a small present. It had a little sticker saying : "for an exciting after christmas". No name on it. Somehow I couldn't resist to take a look. I looked around to see if no one was watching and quickly ripped off the silver colored paper. A bit disappointed I looked at the remote in my hand.

"A remote for after Christmas? Who's stupid idea was this?," I examined the small device. "Besides it only got two buttons," I pressed one of the little round buttons. Suddenly a beam shot out front of the remote. I almost screamed and dropped the device.

Laura’s body continued to swell and stretch higher and higher into the sky. I watched in awe as her heel grew into the back bumper of a car parked in the driveway across the street, and her expansion actually began pushing the car up the driveway. The garage door was only a momentary obstacle, as Laura’s relentlessly growing foot forced the car through the door with a bang.

The demise of the garage door brought the growing, sobbing girl’s attention back down to her feet. “OH, GOD! I’M CAUSING EVEN MORE DAMAGE!” Laura wailed. She stepped forward slightly, moving her heel away from the car, to stand back in the middle of the street. It was a slight movement to the giant girl, but it utterly destroyed the road, as deep cracks radiated out from her feet and each small movement heaved up thick slabs of asphalt. And even with the adjustment, Laura’s feet by now overflowed the road by a large margin. I actually had to step back to maintain a safe distance from her swelling toes, now crushing the front garden.

I looked up. And up. And up. Laura was still sobbing uncontrollably, and her face was contorted into an expression of misery and despair; she had to be more than 200 feet tall by now.

Suddenly and without warning, Laura dropped to her knees with a thunderous boom. I went flying as the ground heaved from the impact, and got buried by an avalanche of snow that was shaken from the tree in the yard.

After I dug myself out, I realized how lucky I had been. Laura hadn’t been paying attention to what was under her when she dropped. I was standing between her legs, the top of her thighs more than 20 feet above my head as they rested on her calves. If either Laura or I had been standing a little to the left or the right, or if Laura had kept her knees together a little more, I would be little more bloodstain.

“Oh, god…” I breathed, as the reality of the situation sank in. I had almost died. I started hyperventilating. Laura might not quite be the monster she feared she was, but she could still do a tremendous amount of damage even if only by accident. The car from earlier had been proof of enough of that, and my close call only reinforced it. I had to get the remote back from that bitch scout!

Laura, meanwhile, was still growing. In front of me, her knees were growing through the wall of our house. I turned around and was confronted by a vag bigger than I was. “Oh, god… this is nuts…” I was close to panicking again. I started giggling hysterically at an absurd thought. I don’t envy her boyfriend! He’ll need scuba gear!

I looked around, still giggling madly. I had to get out of here, out from this prison bounded by Laura’s legs on two sides, her crotch on another, and my house and on the remainder. There was no way I could climb the smooth, dark skin of her calves and thighs. Maybe if she hadn’t shaved her legs so recently, I thought, then broke down into hysterics again. “I can always climb her pubes!” I said between the giggles, then started laughing even harder at the absurd thought.

A crash brought me out of my fit and back to reality. Laura’s knees were continuing to wreak havoc on the front wall of my family’s house. And then I saw the front door, closed and undamaged, right between Laura’s knees. I had had a way out the entire time. Tina, you dumbass, I scolded myself. Think before you panic.

I bolted for the door and rushed into the house. The front wall was still collapsing around Laura’s knees as I made my way through the house. I exited into the back yard and came around to the front, outside Laura’s legs. The young giantess was still kneeling, sobbing pitifully into her hands, but she seemed to have stopped growing. Even on her knees, Laura’s navel was higher than the roof of any house on the block. The house across the street had been completely demolished as her feet had grown through it, while my own home was breaking up around and under a veritable avalanche of thick, brown-skinned thighs.

“Shit...” I muttered, then spied a set of boot tracks leading away through the snow. They had to belong to the other scout.

Casting one last glance at the titanic teenager behind me, I started following the tracks. Soon…

1152211.content:
I didn’t have to go far before I found Laura’s tormenter. She was hiding behind the corner of a house, watching Laura as the giantess wailed miserably. She turned her attention to me as she heard me come up and smirked.

“Alright, kid, fun’s over,” I said, trying my best to be authoritative while standing in the snow in my pajamas. It helped that the girl was shorter than me. She was probably Laura’s age- 16 or so- and I had several inches on her. “Hand over the remote.”

“Are you kidding?” the scout said. “This is great! She’s already destroyed two houses! I wonder when the army’s gonna show up!”

I shook my head, appalled. “Christ, kid. That girl’s life is ruined! And one of those houses was mine. And it’s only going to get worse if we don’t shrink Laura. She already probably killed a guy and is well on her way to destroying the neighborhood and she’s not even trying. What’s going to happen if she gets pissed off?!”

I saw doubt flicker in the scout’s eyes, but she dispelled it with a shake of her head. “No way! Laura’s way too much of a goody-two-shoes to do anything but cry about turning into a giant freak. In fact,” the scout raised the remote. “I don’t think she’s big enough yet.”

“NO!” I cried, and leapt for the remote.

“Let go, bitch!” she shouted. “I’m not done!”

We were both playing tug of war with the remote when the bitch grabbed my hair and gave it a sharp tug.

“YEOWW!” I shook my head, but she kept a fistful of my hair in her grip. I growled and, maintaining my grip on the remote, stopped tugging at the device and instead flung myself at the little monster.

She stumbled backward, and we both fell against the wall of the house, the remote pressed between us. That’s when I heard it: a faint zap.

Shit, the remote had gone off! But who had the beam hit?

For a moment, I thought my eyes were deceiving me. Perhaps if I looked away for a second, the giant wouldn't be there. Much to my surprise, it did not happen. The giant....he was actually there. What took me even more by surprise was who it was. I recalled that his name was Brian. He was slightly older than me, a few grades ahead of me as far as school went. He must of been visiting his family while off from college. My mom was familiar with Brian's mom and I was somewhat familiar with him in the past....Actually, I had a crush on him a few years back. Looking at him now certainly brought back a few feelings, but those feelings were overcome with mass confusion and panic at that moment.

For a while, Brain was motionless, shocked and maybe a bit stunned to do anything. I took the opportunity to observe him from the window, as I'm sure I wasn't the only one curious of this new giant. He was standing with both of his feet together. Even then, his feet took up more than half of the street. I realized he had quite the body that reminded me why I had a crush on him a few years back. Then, my eyes slowly drifted towards his abs and then even lower.

The cold air was numbing me, but I swore my mouth dropped when I realized what I was looking at. Either this gun gave Brian a generous 'side-effect' or that was indeed Brian's natural....state.

Seconds felt like minutes when Brian suddenly made his first move. He looked down at himself and realized he was naked. Naturally, the first thing he did was try to cover himself up with his hands. He suddenly dropped down to a cross legged seat position that shook the entire block. Even I felt the tremors of it and had to find something to balance myself with. The cars were loud around him as they began to sound off their alarms. I heard Brian suddenly shout, "What the hell happened?!!" I peaked and saw that Brian's was still in a state of shock, as he should be. I would be more worried if he found some pleasure in his growth....

His family, as well as other neighbors began to come out to seen the behemoth young man. I could hear the people questioning and screaming, trying to make sense what they were seeing. Brian's new seat now took the entire street, making it impossible to even get around him in a car.

A part of me felt bad for Brian. He was a pretty normal and nice person as far as I knew, and he surely didn't deserve this attention on him. The other part of me however, had this sudden urge to see what would happen if he had another shot of growth. If one make him this big, then what would another one do?....

1242.content:
Matt scoffed at my suggestion. "Yeah right, we haven't arm-wrestled in years. Stop wasting my time."

"I'm serious" I protested. "Two out of three, and if you win I'll do all your housework for a month. I win, and I get the car today". He cocked his eyebrow in suspicion. Why wouldn't he? He was stronger than me (for now at least) and as far as he was concerned had nothing to lose.

"A whole month?" he confirmed. "Just for beating your ass at arm wrestling?"

I nodded in agreement before adding "If you can", trying so hard to conceal my smirk but probably not succeeding very well. Regardless, he took the bait.

"Huh. Alright." he chuckled. "Dunno what you're smoking sis but if it gets me out of chores for a month, you're on!"

We sat at the table and I made sure to hide the remote out of his sight while keeping my fingers on the button after making sure the setting was on 'Grow'. The locked hands.

"GO!" he shouted in a hurry, slamming my arm down to the table.

"Owww, no fucking fair you cheat!" I scolded, rubbing my arm.

"Oh come on sis, like you had a chance to begin with!"

I shot him a scowl. Good job I said two out of three. I should have known better. "Alright, you asked for it. This time, I will count down though"

"Whatever" he chortled. "Just get it over with, I'm running late as it is."

I resumed my position. "Three"

I tensed my arm, keen not to get caught out like last time.

"Two"

I engaged the fire button and felt a warm energy surround me.

"One"

I could already feel my clothes getting tighter and my position changing. Matt was obviously too engaged in his macho bravado to notice.

"Go!"

This time his attempt to catch me out didn't work. I could still feel myself growing although it had definitely slowed down. Regardless, the extra strength caught him by surprise and I was able to push back. His arm hit the desk in a heartbeat, he was TOTALLY caught off guard!

"Ha! That's what you get for being cocky!" I taunted.

He looked confused and was eying me up with bemusement. I thought initially that he had noticed something different in me - I was clearly stronger than I was a minute ago and several inches taller but being sat down must have made it harder to notice. "N-No fair! You clearly lifted your arm off the desk!" he cried.

"Bullshit, you're just mad that you got beat by your little sis!" I could tell he was mad now. "Let's go again!" I cheered, suddenly mad at myself for not making more demands if I won... when I won.

Once again, I held the remote against my skin and fired as we locked hands. Immediately I tensed as he tried his signature trick of catching me off guard but not only was I ready for it, I was also bigger and stronger, and getting bigger and stronger still. Matt was too tense to notice and to be fair, I almost didn't notice either at first but then the task started getting easier. Matt was clearly pushing with all of his strength.

I was enjoying the stalemate until my thoughts were interrupted by my bra snapping under my shirt! Fuck, how big am I now? I glanced at Matt and noticed my viewpoint was several inches above his now and our evenly-matched contest was definitely decidedly easier for me. For all the grit and determination on his face, he couldn't move me and I burst out laughing.

"What's up Matty? You're not giving up so easily are you?!" I teased. He looked at me and suddenly the penny seemed to drop.

"W-what the fu..."

I pushed gently and his face tensed in response but to no avail. I made sure I did it slowly, like a cat playing with a mouse but finally, I planted his hand on the table without breaking a sweat. I stood up triumphantly and whooped. "Suck it bro! I just beat your ass!"

Meanwhile he stayed stood in his chair motionless and flabbergasted, his arm still in the 'defeated' position, staring up at me. It was only now that I appreciated the full gravity of my situation, and how much my remaining clothes were digging in to my skin. I must have been over 7 feet tall now, not too far away from brushing my head against the ceiling either, and it felt fucking amazing. I put my hands on my hips in a power-pose and smirked down at my 'little' brother.

I carried on teasing Matt as I swiped the keys from his hand. "Thanks 'little' bro!" I teased as I did so, enjoying viewpoint as I did so. He just continued to stare dumbfounded at my enhanced body as I made my way towards the door. Unfortunately, I didn't factor in my increased height as I was about to walk through the doorway and I smacked my head clean against the doorframe. Letting out a little curse I recomposed myself and left the house. Matt was still staring incredulously at me without moving. "Fucking smooth, Tina!" I cussed.

The car wasn't very big and I quickly realised that my seven foot+ frame would not be a very comfortable ride. I smiled and flicked the switch on the remote before feeling a familiar sensation as my viewpoint this time started to lower. Restoring myself at a few inches more than my usual height, I let out a satisfied sigh and drove away.

The school was fairly quiet due to the time of year but I spotted Kelly, the team captain. She greeted me with a wave as I got out of the car. "Hey T, I didn't think you could make it today?"

"Yeah, I got my days mixed up..." I lied.

"Well we're certainly grateful, " Kelly responded. "It's only five of us... well, six now, against the top of the league. Your clothes look a bit ragged, " she said. I glanced down at them, slightly stretched and torn from my earlier growth spurt. "Good thing we have some spare kits inside!" she said.

I got changed with the rest of the team; Kelly, the captain. Aimee, Jill, Crystal and Holly were the other four. Kelly was the tallest at about six feet herself and Aimee was the shortest, barely five and a half feet tall. I started on the bench as the others took to the court. Our coach, an athletic 30 something PE teacher, gave the girls a pep talk as we warmed up as the other team entered the court.
"Fucking hell" Aimee whispered to me. "They're all huge!"
She was right as well - not a single one of them was under six feet tall and one of them looked nearer to seven! I smirked at the thought of my secret weapon. "Don't worry Aims, I've got a good feeling about this game!" but she didn't look convinced.

I took my seat on the bench as the teams finished warming up and plotted my next move discreetly as I fumbled with the remote behind my back.

12431.content:
Just like that, Matt, taking the remote with him, left Tina, all of 4'5" tall, essentially stranded at home-- a prisoner of her own size. Fortunately, her mother was gone for the weekend and wasn't expected home any time soon. In the end, she was just going to have to wait for Matt to get home from his date and go from there. It was better than trying her luck outside at her current size. She decided to try and make the best of the wait. She knew that Matt was going to see a movie with his girlfriend, so he was gone for at least three hours, barring any after-date activities. He had the remote, which meant that there were more options for activities than ever before.

Still, Tina was small, and her clothes were essentially useless. The first order of business was to get clothed. Her panties and shorts had already fallen down, leaving her shirt ballooning over her diminished frame. Her bra hung uselessly. Stripping off those remaining articles, she set out, nude, to change that. Going to her room, she awed at the size of everything in the house, the backs of chairs were at eye-level, the staircase was a daunting mountain. Coming down the hallway, she turned the chest-high doorknob and walked into her room.

It was a difficult thing for Tina to come to terms with her new littleness. Her dresser was well above her head, her bed came up to chest-level. She took a deep breath and went over to her closet and found a box of older clothes, which she had been meaning to get rid of. Fortunately, she hadn't. Going through, she found a really old pair of athletic shorts from middle school, and t-shirt from around the same time. Trying them on, Tina was able to tie the shorts tightly around her small waist, but couldn't help their length- they came down below her knees. The shirt was a little better, but still hung precariously on her small frame. A bra and panties was more or less out of the question at her size, so she made do with what she had. Feeling a bit tired from her exertions, she locked the door, and climbed onto her bed, and took a nap.


Tina woke up a mere hour later to the sound of laughing and shouting downstairs. Matt and his girlfriend Jen had clearly skipped out on the movie and decided to come home. Now was her opportunity to get the remote back, or at least get herself a little closer to her normal size. She crept downstairs, intent on snatching the remote while nobody was looking, but as if waiting for her, there stood Matt and Jen, tickling each other. Tina was immediately spotted. Yet, Tina noticed something different. Matt was around 5'9" tall, and Jen was even shorter than Tina (was), but looking at the two of them, Tina noticed that they were about the same height, perhaps Jen even taller than Matt. Not only that, but their clothes hung slightly loosely off of both of them. Tina stood up and estimated that the two lovebirds, still more interested in each other than in Tina, were each only about 5' tall.

Looking her way, Matt cried, "Sis! This thing is amazing! We decided to skip the flick and test it out. After I told her how small you were, Jen insisted we come home and play around with it. We shrank each other, and even figured out how to make our clothes fit a little better. I even shrank the car a little bit so I could still drive it!" At this point, Jen walked over to Tina and said, "Wow, Matty, she is small- but then again, so are we!" Tina sensed that the situation wasn't as serious as she had thought it would be and let her guard down. "Yeah... it's actually pretty cool" she said with some genuine enthusiasm. Jen then, "First thing's first! Everybody gets to be the same size!" Grabbing the remote from Matt, Jen turned it on him and tapped down the S button lightly. As the beam hit him, Matt began to dwindle slowly. This time, however, his already shrunken, poorly fitting, clothes weren't going along for the ride. The inches ticked off and within a minute, he had gone from a hair under 5 feet to a hair under 4'5". Tina noticed that he was just barely smaller than she was. He must have registered the difference too, but didn't say anything as he walked toward Jen, took the remote from her, and returned the favor, shrinking her down to just above 4'5" tall. Jen, now the tallest in the room by mere fractions of an inch, kicked off her shoes and let her pants fall to the ground as she jumped into Matt's smaller arms and kissed him. Matt lost his pants in the jolt, but was clearly enjoying being the smallest in the room.

After the kiss, Jen turned to Tina and said:

I didn't respond, she gave me a frown. I crossed the street and walked past Emily. She was alone, her brother probably got bored and went inside. She smiled at me and I knew she would talk my ears off if I stopped walking.

"Hey Tina!," the teen said. I didn't even look at her. "Not now Emily!," I snarled and increased my speed. I hadn't thought about the fact that it had frozen last night. Before I knew what happened I slipped and fell with the back of my head on the pavement. Everything went black.

I woke up...
13.title: Dumb Accident

131.content:
I woke up groggily, face down in a rough fabric material. My head still hurt from my fall. I guess I should've been more careful. Something doesn't quite feel right, where am I? I opened my eyes, not recognizing the room I was in, the bed I was on felt like it was made of a hard plastic material. My eyes swept over the wall, the dresser was a solid pink color and the mirror on the wall was a sticker. Looking over to the other side of the wall my heart nearly lept out of my chest. There wasn't a wall, just a view out into a room! Oh my God, I was in a dollhouse! I sat up with a jolt, quickly realizing that I was no longer in my regular clothes, but a doll dress. The shrink ray must've went off when I fell. Quickly, I stood up and looked for the shrink ray, but it was nowhere to be found. Panic began to take over as I looked around for my clothes. Looking over the edge of the second floor, I saw my real clothes strewn about on the floor.

"Whoever put me in here undressed me just like I was a doll..." I though, shuddering.

The shrink ray could be anywhere! Was I going to be trapped like this forever? Just then, the door swung open. In came a giant Emily, shutting the door behind her. Her eyes locked with mine and a big grin grew on her face.

"Tina doll, you're awake!" She said cheerfully, making her way to her dollhouse.

Panic gripped me as the giant sixteen-year-old approached, kneeling down to get a better look at me. I screamed, backing up against the room's wall. I had nowhere to go. She giggled as her giant hand came in after me.

"Come here!" Her voice boomed as the fleshy vice wrapped around my waist and pulled me from the dollhouse.

"Ugh! STOP! Emily put me down!" I ordered in a panic, wriggling around in her hand.

The giantess held me in her hand as if I were mearly a toy. Her giant voice boomed again with a giggle.

"Stop wiggling Tina. If you're gonna be a good doll, you have to listen to me." She said plainly.

"I'm not your freaking doll! Now put me down so I can get back to normal!" I shouted.

She laid down stomach first on the bed and put me down in front of her.

"Oh no, you're staying little!" She grinned, her head resting in her hands as she stared at me.

"Yor remote fell and made you little when you fell. I tried it when you were sleeping and it wouldn't work, I think it needs batteries or something. Guess I'll ask Dave to fix it," She said, playing with my hair.

Aggravated I pushed her finger away.

"Well then where is it?!" I yelled, I was getting very upset with her.

She flicked me in the stomach, knocking me on my butt.

"Don't talk to me that way Tina." She ordered. "I put it in my jewelry box, I don't need it if it's not gonna work." She said, reaching for me again.

I kicked and groaned as her hand came back but Emily had no problem picking me up again.

"I've got you for Christmas, anyways. I don’t need it." She smiled at me.

I felt defeated, but I knew I couldn't give up just yet. I can't spend the rest of my life as this Emily's doll! She sat down in front of her dollhouse. I gulped as I knew, at least for now, I was going to have to endure.

"Ok Tina, let's play..."
131.title: In A Plastic House

1311.content: Emily reached over the dollhouse and grabbed a small, clear storage box and opened it hastily one hand still wrapped tightly around my waist. "Hmm maybe this, no we can save that one for summer" she said dropping a Tinker Bell dress to the floor. She then threw me on top of the many doll clothes and began putting different outfit over me. "This one is too big" she said. "You cant wear this one with out the matching shoe's and I only have one" she said. "This one... oh never mind you might need this later" she said giggling a bit throwing a doll diaper to her bed. This went on for another two hours entirely halfway through the box the stopped putting the clothes over me and forced me in them them she would put me on the edge of her bed make me turn around and then grab me to be redressed. At last she decided on a Lacey pink dress that was a piece of fabric on top and the skirt was made of lace and was very ruffled and though when she looked in the doll mirror Emily though it was pretty but I knew that only a doll would wear it. "Now we can do your hair and makeup" said Emily clapping her hands with excitement and grabbing me and making me walk into a shoe box that had a crudely cut rectangular hole on one end and over the hole was the words "Hair and makeup" written red marker. "Now you wait here while I get everything ready" said Emily. I looked miserably at the hole through which I could see the closed bedroom door even if I went to the door I was much to small to have a chance at opening it and to large to squeeze trough the gaps. "Even if I got out" I thought miserably "I would just end up another chew toy for the dog. I thought about perhaps sneaking out of the house and running home before glancing at the window and noticed it was snowing again and realized that by the time it stopped the snow would be over my head. I decided to look around the shoe box and what I found did not cheer me up the corners of box were lined with different chairs from the doll house and in some of the chairs dolls were seated many of the dolls had multi colored hair with streaks marker and in some cases crayon or else with hair missing one was actually bald. Their faces were not much better some had simply pink dots on their cheeks and red lips but some had tiny pictures on their faces. Just then Emily's giant hand grabs me and I am lifted and then seated on the edge of the bed Emily is sitting crisis-cross behind me a hairbrush, a pair of scissors, and a box of hair accessories in her lap the scissors scare me a bit but I am relived to see she didn't have any markers. The next half hour Emily brushed my hair and then styled it into pig tails tied with red ribbons. When she was finished she said "good now we can start your doll class". "Doll class? Emily aren't you getting too old for this" I responded. "Yes doll class you have to learn how to be a good doll and do whatever I tell you now it's time for your first class" She said. "Now say you love me" she said grinning a bit. "NO" I shouted at her she pulled from behind her back a very small squirt gun and sprayed me saying "Bad doll". "What the hell was that for you jerk" I shouted at her. "You were bad so I had to punish now lets try again say you love me" she said crossing her arms over her breasts. "NO way" I responded. "Bad" she said spraying me again. I wanted to tell her off but she held up the squirt gun again threateningly I groaned loudly. "Fine I love you" I said quietly. Emily giggled "I can't hear you" she said . "I love you" I said loudly she sprayed me again. "Talk more sweetly to me" said Emily. I smile and say in my sweetest voice "I love you". "Good girl now then that's enough class for one day now it's time for...."
1311.title: Dress Up

132.content:
I didn't know how long I was gone, but when I opened my eyes again I was confused. Everything around me looked pretty dim. My surroundings had a white tint with the exception of some odd pinkish shapes. I could hear the sound of streaming water, like someone had turned on a giant faucet. Then I realized I was sitting in water. It was at a warm, pleasant temperature. I looked down and saw the water had a white tint as well.

I rubbed my eyes and slowly my vision returned. Again I looked at the water, I realized the water wasn't white it was the foam floating on it. It had large bubbles, almost the size of my head! The water was level with my bare boobies, which bobbed out of the water. Wait a minute... I was naked! I quickly crossed my arms over my breasts just in case, and took another look at my surroundings. I was sitting in a small lake of foam.

The foam ended at some large porcelain white walls, which were slightly rounded and looked pretty high. On either side of me were the huge pink colored things. They were about twice my height and looked pretty thick, kinda soft to. They looked almost...fleshy!? I looked behind me, there was a flesh colored wall. As I looked slightly up I saw a huge belly-button! I was sitting between huge legs and leaning against a giant belly!

I reached out my hand and touched the flesh wall. "That tickles!," I craned my head and looked straight in the eyes of a giantess!

I was sitting in a bath tub with a giant...
132.title: Foam Lake

1323.content:
I looked up at Emily who was still staring at me with anticipation and greed like I was a puppy she had always wanted. The water filled the tub and I was floating among the foam.
"Emily what happened this morning after you saw me?". Emily's eyes and face exploded with excitement as though seeing me talk was a display of fireworks she grabbed me and said "You came walking out of your house (she dragged me across the side of the bathtub) then after that you fell (she turns me over in her hand) then there was a flash and you were gone (she put me down next to a bottle of shampoo) I walked over to where you were there were pieces's of a broken device and you were tiny (she giggled before adding) Tiny Tina then I picked you up and took you inside".

While Emily washed I sat on the side as thought after thought haunted me. The only thing that could get me back to normal was destroyed. My mom thought I was out with a friend and didn't know when I was supposed to be back it would be days before she sent out a full search and rescue. The only two people who knew about my current situation were Emily and I. Emily's single mother was rarely home and at my current size I wouldn't dare try to warn her twin brother. I looked over at Emily, what would she do to me? Would she take care of me and keep me alive? As I thought about how I would have to rely on a teenager I couldn't help but feel like a pet.

"All clean your turn Tiny Tina". She grabbed me again and slathered me with body wash and scrubbed me hard with a washcloth until finally she said "All done". After nearly melting from the heat of a hairdryer Emily (wrapped in a yellow towel) placed her open palm in front of me I look up at her questionably. "Hop on silly" she said in a cheery tone. I jumped on her hand and we were off.
1323.title: Emily!

13231.content:
Emily's room was my first glimpse at my fate. Practically everything in the room was pink the walls, floor, window frame, the bed sheets, even the closet door. Dolls and stuffed animals filled every corner of the room Barbie dolls lying in the large doll house, a baby doll was lying in it's crib, a stuffed elephant wearing a purple hat and fake pearls, a teddy bear wearing a paper towel like diaper and a Barbie my size wearing a pink ball gown were all seated on her desk. She was far to old for this.

"Welcome to your new home Tiny Tina from now on you and me are gonna play all day long, you can be my new little sister" Emily said giggling and closing the door. "I'll dress you and feed you, we'll sleep together and be best friends forever". Emily gasped dramatically then added "we can have a slumber party every night" practically jumping with excitement.

It was only noon outside but that didn't stop Emily from forcing me into "slumber party" activities. She had already put on her Pink pajamas and forced me in to a purple nightgown, she went through her dvd collection to find some girl flicks.

At four o'clock the slumber party officially began with a game Emily invented where she would pull random outfits out of the box where she kept her doll's clothes and I would have to wear them for how ever long she wanted. After a few rounds I didn't think it was so bad but then Emily pulled out a diaper "oh no" I shouted. Emily smiled "don't worry baby, mommy will take good care of you". She picked me up stripped me of the fairy wings I was wearing and slipped the diaper on me. "There now you know Tina I think you'll make a very pretty dolly" said Emily.
13231.title: Emilys room

132311.content:
"Pretty doll" I shouted taken back. "Emily I don't want to learn how to be a doll because I don't want to be a doll I want to be full size". Emily grabbed me and brought me to her face. "But you are a doll now Tina, I don't know how but you are and I have to take care of you so you better learn to do what I say" she said placing me on the bed.

"Emily" I shouted desperately "I am not a toy I'm not a pet or a doll you can't manipulate and tell me what to do I am a human being and you can't treat me like this". Emily slammed down a hand on the bed so hard I fell on my back she was shaking with anger and red faced. "I can treat you however I want because you need me to live and you'll do what I say or else" she added threateningly. As much as I wanted to argue, as much as I wanted to tell her she was wrong and that I could last without her I didn't because deep down I knew she was right. My only other possible hope for survival would be her twin brother but he would probably treat me worse and would probably think of me as his personal sex slave.

My thoughts of having to give in were growing more and more depressing but then it was like a fire of hope lit inside me. All I had to do was convince Emily she would want me back to normal size and I would be able to get back to my home and somehow get back my size back. I look up at her with apologetic eyes "I'm sorry Emily, but do you really think you can take care of me?" I asked her in my sweetest voice. Emily seemed surprised in my change of heart and replied with confidence in her voice "Of course I can I'm a big girl and I can take care of a tiny person". It was clear what I had to do I would play her game I would have too but I would make my care giver as miserable as I could without angering her.

For the next few hours we watched movies, our makeovers ended with me and my makeover disaster under the sink for ten minutes easily the worst part of the evening was "Truth or dare" or maybe "Emily Humiliates Tina" would be a better name. "OK Tina I dare you to..... say you love me" said Emily giggly. I muster up my strength and said in the sweetest voice I could manage "I love you Emily". Emily sloppily kisses me on the head and giggles as I try to throw off her saliva. "Tina who is your best friend" Emily asks hopefully. "You are Emily" I lie. Emily looked at me and I could tell she had thought up a dare that I would regret, I was just wondering if I could do what ever it was when she said "Tina I dare you to use your diaper".

I was silent for a while I was debating in my head what to do on one hand I had to keep Emily happy if I ever wanted to be restored, but on the other hand my pride told me to tell her no. But looking down at the diaper I was forced to wear, and guiding a finger across my face still faded multicolored from my makeover made me realize how little pride I had left and that I was going to get back to my normal life I would have keep Emily happy for now my decision was clear.

I closed my eyes already regretting my choice but I knew I had to do it I told myself as I felt the last of my pride trickle into my diaper. Emily watched in sick amusement her eyes growing with excitement as the wet spot on my diaper kept growing and I could tell she was holding back an eruption of giggles. My last streak of pride gone I decided to go all the way and said in my very best and sweetest doll voice "Em.....(I paused struggling to get the words out) Momma I made a mess please change me". Emily immediately fell backwards on the bed laughing.

After taking off my diaper and throwing it away Emily rewarded my good behavior by not replacing it instead she dressed me back in my purple night gown and carried me to bed with her. "Tina" Emily said. "Yes Emily" I responded. "Are you gonna stay here forever?" She asked. I swallowed my fear and responded "of course I will Emily". "Good because I like you Tina and I don't ever want you to leave me" Emily said relieved. "Yeah I will always be here for you too dress up and play with" I said struggling to keep the bitterness out of my voice. "Well that's good but that's not why I always want you here with me" Emily said already half asleep. "Then why" I asked only half caring. "Because now that your here (yawn) I finally have a real friend" she responded and with out another word she drifted into sleep making little snores as she slept, I couldn't help but feel touched. I broke Emily's grip on me and walked over to her face sleeping face I resisted wanting to kiss her good night "your not that bad" I said knelling down under her hand now more like a blanket then a strait jacket and fell asleep.

The next day was a.....
132311.title: that night

1323111.content:
I woke up earlier then I would of liked for whatever reason I awoke fully refreshed at 5:00am and I gave up on getting back to sleep after trying for twenty minutes. No matter how hard I tried Emily's words from last night kept creeping their way back into my thoughts. Yes she had tortured me but it was only now that I realized that if she had left me outside I would have froze to the sidewalk. " But then" I said to myself "she was just playing really, she didn't hurt me".

I looked over at Emily and smiled yet I couldn't help but wonder a few things. Was what she said last night true? Did Emily have no friends? Come to think of it I'd never heard her talk about her friends. Ever since Emily was little she had never once failed to ring my doorbell every Saturday and whenever mom was home I would have to answer and she would spend hours telling me about this and that, she would talk endlessly while her brother watched TV or played videogames. I always ignored her, I never thought she came to me because she was lonely I always assumed she was just a chatter box. My thoughts however were interrupted by a pounding on the door. "Emily! Wake up you sloth!," the door opened.

It was...
1323111.title: a typical morning

info.brief_description: Tina finds a very special size changing gift under the christmas tree...
info.description:
Stop adding one-sentence chapters to give two more choices. I'll delete them!

Tina finds a small present under the christmas tree surprisingly it's a grow & shrink device...

Our main character is 19 years old Tina 5'6'' tall. She lives with her brother Matt 5'8'' tall (22) and her mom Karen (40) 5ft tall who divorced a few years ago. (Tina's dad lives in Mexico).

(Characters don't have to exist in "The Size Remote")

The remote has a growth and a shrink option and works on everything except for clothing. (Sounds good right?)


I tolerate most adds to this story, but try to at least follow these guidelines:

- No characters under 16
- Keep the death-rate to a minimum. There are plenty of crush and vore related interactived around here.
- Try to at least write more than a few sentences for a chapter, who wants to read yes/no question-chapters for fun?
- Don't end the story! What's the fun in ending an interactive anyway?

Go crazy with anything else!

Enjoy!
